name: Datatech Media
tag_list: php, development, india, web-development, website-designer, web-developer-india, seo, sem, ppc, seo-services, outsourcing, software-development, internet-marketing
overview: There are many design companies available on the web, but those who provide cost-effective web designing solutions rule the roost. DataTech is a web design company in India that gives custom-made web designing and web development services for its domestic and international clients. DataTech has emerged as an affordable website design company in international market with a gamut of web designing products such as corporate web designing, creative web designing, flash web designing, web designing for ecommerce site and designer website. All these services are available for small and big organizations. The winning combination of SEO-friendly design and PHP development gives DataTech an edge over its rival web designing companies.
